name: knowtif-extension
description: Receive GitHub notifications from knowtif with customizable popups and notification history
author: NagusameCS

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p dist-firefox && cp -r src/* dist-firefox/ && cp manifest-firefox.json dist-firefox/manifest.json && cp -r icons dist-firefox/
